attributes.action: Ban HGV's from overtaking during peek traffic times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HGV's are governed to the same (ish) maximum speed. Overtaking therefore takes a long time. The effect is a traffic jam behind this rolling road block.
This ban will increase safety, reduce emissions, improve traffic flow for no financial outlay.
It may be an election winner.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
